name: God Only Knows
description:
God Only Knows is a short fantasy game in the style of a classic RPG.    After facing Sour Ron, your hero is cursed with memory loss.  Together with his companion - who has been cursed into the shape of a rose - he must journey to find and defeat Sour Ron to restore his name and the rose's true form.

This is my first completed project, and I made it to propose to my fiance.  The game takes approximately one hour to complete, was created using RPGMaker XV Ace using resources provided with the software, and is predominantly story-driven.  It is designed for people new to RPGs.
